acceptedAnswer.text: Clodo Framework is a lightweight, optimized framework designed specifically for Cloudflare Workers. It provides a developer-friendly API with minimal overhead while maximizing edge computing performance.

mainEntity.name: Is Clodo better than Hono and Worktop?

acceptedAnswer.text: Each framework has distinct advantages. Clodo excels in performance and developer experience for edge computing, while Hono offers a broader ecosystem and Worktop provides excellent TypeScript support. Choose based on your specific project requirements.

mainEntity.name: How do I deploy to Cloudflare Workers?

acceptedAnswer.text: Deployment to Cloudflare Workers is straightforward with the Wrangler CLI. Simply configure your wrangler.toml file and run 'wrangler publish' to deploy your Clodo application globally.

mainEntity.name: What are the benefits of edge computing?

acceptedAnswer.text: Edge computing reduces latency by processing requests closer to users, improves performance, reduces server load, provides better scalability, and offers automatic global distribution without managing infrastructure.
